00023         private MouseState mouseState;
00024         private Obj cursor;

00027         #region Class
00028         public BulletHell()
00029         {
00030             _GLOBAL.Graphics = new GraphicsDeviceManager(this);
00031             _GLOBAL.ContentManager = new ContentManager(Services, "Content");
00032             _GLOBAL.GameStateManager = new GameStateManager(this);
00033             Components.Add(_GLOBAL.GameStateManager);
00034         }
00035 
00036         /* Global Variables initialization */
00037         protected override void Initialize()
00038         {
00039             //graphicMode(1440, 900, true);
00040 
00041             _GLOBAL.InputHandler = new InputHandler();
00042             _GLOBAL.Viewport = _GLOBAL.Graphics.GraphicsDevice.Viewport;
00043             _GLOBAL.ViewportRect = new Rectangle(_GLOBAL.Viewport.X, _GLOBAL.Viewport.Y, _GLOBAL.Viewport.Width, _GLOBAL.Viewport.Height);
00044             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch = new SpriteBatch(GraphicsDevice);
00045             _GLOBAL.AudioEngine = new AudioEngine(@"Content\audio\audioEngine.xgs");
00046             _GLOBAL.WaveBank = new WaveBank(_GLOBAL.AudioEngine, @"Content\audio\waveBank.xwb");
00047             _GLOBAL.SoundBank = new SoundBank(_GLOBAL.AudioEngine, @"Content\audio\soundBank.xsb");
00048 
00049             base.Initialize();
00050             cursor = new Obj(cursorTexture, 0, 0);
00051 
00052             _GLOBAL.GameStateManager.activate(new Opening());
00053         }
00054 
00055         protected override void LoadContent()
00056         {
00057             cursorTexture = _GLOBAL.ContentManager.Load<Texture2D>(@"cursor\normal");
00058             _GLOBAL.SpriteFont = _GLOBAL.ContentManager.Load<SpriteFont>(@"fonts\gamefont");
00059             _GLOBAL.HuakanFont = _GLOBAL.ContentManager.Load<SpriteFont>(@"fonts\DFShaoNvW5-GB");
00060         }
00061 
00062         protected override void UnloadContent()
00063         {
00064         }
00065 
00066         /* updates mouse, Audio Engine and inputs */
00067         protected override void Update(GameTime gameTime)
00068         {
00069             if(_GLOBAL.Debug)
00070                 mouse();
00071             
00072             _GLOBAL.AudioEngine.Update();
00073             
00074             if (_GLOBAL.Quit)
00075                 Exit();
00076             
00077             _GLOBAL.InputHandler.Update(gameTime);
00078             
00079             if (GamePad.GetState(PlayerIndex.One).Buttons.Back == ButtonState.Pressed)
00080                 this.Exit();
00081 
00082             base.Update(gameTime);
00083         }
00084 
00085         protected override void Draw(GameTime gameTime)
00086         {
00087             GraphicsDevice.Clear(Color.Black);
00088 
00089             base.Draw(gameTime);
00090             if (_GLOBAL.Debug)
00091                 drawCoor();
00092         }
00093 
00094         private void mouse()
00095         {
00096             mouseState = Mouse.GetState();
00097             cursor.position.X = mouseState.X;
00098             cursor.position.Y = mouseState.Y;
00099         }
00100 
00101         /* draw the mouse cursor and (x, y) coordinate of it */
00102         private void drawCoor()
00103         {
00104             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.Begin();
00105             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.DrawString(_GLOBAL.SpriteFont, "(" + mouseState.X + ", " + mouseState.Y + ")", new Vector2(10, 10), Color.Blue);
00106             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.Draw(cursor.sprite, cursor.position, Color.White);
00107             _GLOBAL.SpriteBatch.End();
00108         }
00109 
00110         /* this method sets the screen to the resolution given. If the resolution given is in the display mode, accept the changes.
00111          * Return false otherwise. */
00112         internal bool graphicMode(int width, int height, bool fullScreen)
00113         {
00114             if (fullScreen == false)
00115             {
00116                 if ((width <= GraphicsAdapter.DefaultAdapter.CurrentDisplayMode.Width)
00117                     && (height <= GraphicsAdapter.DefaultAdapter.CurrentDisplayMode.Height))
00118                 {
00119                     _GLOBAL.Graphics.PreferredBackBufferWidth = width;
00120                     _GLOBAL.Graphics.PreferredBackBufferHeight = height;
00121                     _GLOBAL.Graphics.IsFullScreen = fullScreen;
00122                     _GLOBAL.Graphics.ApplyChanges();
00123                     return true;
00124                 }
00125             }
00126             else
00127             {
00128                 foreach (DisplayMode resolution in GraphicsAdapter.DefaultAdapter.SupportedDisplayModes)
00129                 {
00130                     if ((resolution.Width == width) && (resolution.Height == height))
00131                     {
00132                         _GLOBAL.Graphics.PreferredBackBufferWidth = width;
00133                         _GLOBAL.Graphics.PreferredBackBufferHeight = height;
00134                         _GLOBAL.Graphics.IsFullScreen = fullScreen;
00135                         _GLOBAL.Graphics.ApplyChanges();
00136                         return true;
00137                     }
00138                 }
00139             }
00140             return false;
00141         }
